name: fishing-rod
effect: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.
short_effect: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A Fishing Rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A fishing rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A fishing rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
